title: Associate Health Minister Casey Costello got warning of possible Treaty of Waitangi breach over smokefree law repeal
transTitle: 卫生部副部长凯西·科斯特洛收到警告，称废除无烟法可能违反《怀唐伊条约》

title: Wellington's Reading Cinemas deal debate to go public
transTitle: 惠灵顿雷丁电影院交易辩论将公开

title: Wellington Mayor Tory Whanau finally reveals details of secret Reading Cinema deal
transTitle: 惠灵顿市长 Tory Whanau 最终透露了雷丁影院秘密交易的细节

title: Tribesmen gang member Dylan Stuart set to lose cash, ute and jewellery allegedly gained from drug dealing
transTitle: 部落帮成员迪伦·斯图尔特将失去据称通过毒品交易获得的现金、皮特和珠宝

title: Hawke’s Bay Regional Council adopts rates shake-up despite almost 90% opposition from submitters
transTitle: 尽管遭到近 90% 的提交者反对，霍克斯湾地区委员会还是通过了费率调整

title: Air NZ sorry for charging tourists $13,000 to change flight after terminal diagnosis
transTitle: 新西兰航空对旅客在航站楼诊断后改签航班收取13,000纽币的费用表示歉意

title: Newshub boss aware of proposal since January
transTitle: Newshub 老板自一月份起就意识到了这一提议

title: Te Whatu Ora will need five years to fix outdated hospital HR systems - report
transTitle: Te Whatu Ora 将需要五年时间来修复过时的医院人力资源系统 - 报告

title: Man appears in court after armed stand-off with police
transTitle: 男子与警方武装对峙后出庭

title: Newshub closure: News outlet reports its own demise on 6pm bulletin
transTitle: Newshub 关闭：新闻媒体在下午 6 点的公告中报道了自己的倒闭

title: Fa’anānā Efeso Collins: Public memorial for late Green MP set to attract massive crowds
transTitle: Fa’anānā Efeso Collins：已故绿党议员的公共纪念馆将吸引大量人群

title: Wellington City Council's Reading Cinemas deal made public
transTitle: 惠灵顿市议会与雷丁电影院的交易公开

title: Recap: Newshub to close down newsroom in June
transTitle: 回顾：Newshub 将于 6 月关闭新闻编辑室

title: Whakaari tour companies maintain they were misled by WorkSafe, other govt agencies
transTitle: 法卡里旅游公司坚称他们受到了工作安全局和其他政府机构的误导
